Description: Five frames of charred fragments of papyri, approximately 13 fragments in each frame. Apparently written in Greek on one side only. The unsealed frames are contained in a black box similar to EA 79721.1.
Curator's comments: Previously unregistered. Identified in 2009 in trays of miscellaneous material that had been moved into store room M4. Being studied by Kim Ryholt (Copenhagen).
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: carbonised, fragmented, fragile Black ink: visible with infra-red Red ink: ? Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (cracked, dirty, ill fitting) Box: purpose made with Plastazote padding Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: E
